messages.content: There is this youtuber who does straight line missions across countries. Why does he do those?
I'm not sure, as I am not familiar with the specific YouTuber you are referring to. Could you provide more information or context about the person and their channel?
I just saw a video from GeoWizard.

Ah, I see. GeoWizard is a YouTuber who does straight line missions across different countries. These missions are designed to showcase the geographic features and landmarks of different countries while highlighting the speed and efficiency of his travel. He often completes these missions in a single day, covering a large distance and visiting many iconic sites. His channel has gained a large following for his unique approach to travel and geography.
